descriptions.hotel_information:
Property Location
A Hotel Brno is in the heart of Voronezh, walking distance from Lenin Square and Voronezh State Theatre for Young Spectators. This hotel is within close proximity of Voronezh Regional Literature Museum I. Nikitin and Monument to White Bim the Black Ear.

Rooms
Make yourself at home in one of the 116 guestrooms featuring refrigerators. Complimentary wireless Internet access keeps you connected, and cable programming is available for your entertainment. Bathrooms have bathtubs or showers and complimentary toiletries. Conveniences include desks, as well as phones with free local calls.

Dining
Enjoy a satisfying meal at a restaurant serving guests of A Hotel Brno. Buffet breakfasts are available daily for a fee.

Property Location
A stay at nun Boutique Hotel places you in the heart of Antalya, convenient to Terra City Shopping Center and Shemall Shopping Center. This hotel is within close proximity of Laura Shopping Center and BLM Beach.

Rooms
Make yourself at home in one of the 32 air-conditioned rooms featuring minibars and LED televisions. Rooms have private balconies. Complimentary wireless Internet access keeps you connected, and satellite programming is available for your entertainment. Private bathrooms with showers feature complimentary toiletries and hair dryers.

Amenities
Take in the views from a garden and make use of amenities such as complimentary wireless Internet access and concierge services.

Dining
Take advantage of the hotel's room service (during limited hours). Quench your thirst with your favorite drink at a bar/lounge.

Business, Other Amenities
Featured amenities include a 24-hour front desk and multilingual staff. Free self parking is available onsite.

Property Location
With a stay at A-One The Royal Cruise Hotel Pattaya in Pattaya (Pattaya Bay), you'll be minutes from Pattaya International Hospital and Pattaya Beach. This 4-star hotel is within close proximity of Central Center Pattaya and Art in Paradise.

Rooms
Make yourself at home in one of the 196 air-conditioned rooms featuring refrigerators and minibars. Rooms have private balconies. 32-inch LED televisions with cable programming provide entertainment, while complimentary wireless Internet access keeps you connected. Bathrooms have complimentary toiletries and hair dryers.

Amenities
Relax and unwind with massages and body treatments. If you're looking for recreational opportunities, you'll find an outdoor pool, a fitness center, and karaoke. This hotel also features complimentary wireless Internet access, concierge services, and a fireplace in the lobby.

Dining
Satisfy your appetite at the hotel's restaurant, which serves breakfast, lunch, and dinner. Dining is also available at a coffee shop/café, and 24-hour room service is provided. Quench your thirst with your favorite drink at a bar/lounge.

Business, Other Amenities
Featured amenities include dry cleaning/laundry services, a 24-hour front desk, and luggage storage. Free self parking is available onsite.

name: A-One The Royal Cruise Hotel Pattaya

descriptions.hotel_information:
Property Location
With a stay at A-One New Wing Hotel in Pattaya (Pattaya Bay), you'll be minutes from Next Fashion Tailor and Pattaya International Hospital. This 4-star hotel is within close proximity of Pattaya Beach and Art in Paradise.

Rooms
Make yourself at home in one of the 264 air-conditioned rooms featuring refrigerators and LCD televisions. Rooms have private balconies. Complimentary wireless Internet access keeps you connected, and digital programming is available for your entertainment. Private bathrooms with shower/tub combinations feature complimentary toiletries and hair dryers.

Amenities
Dip into one of the 2 outdoor swimming pools or enjoy other recreational amenities including a nightclub and a sauna. This hotel also features complimentary wireless Internet access, an arcade/game room, and gift shops/newsstands.

Dining
Enjoy a meal at one of the hotel's dining establishments, which include 3 restaurants and a coffee shop/café. From your room, you can also access 24-hour room service. Relax with your favorite drink at a bar/lounge or a poolside bar. Buffet breakfasts are available for a fee.

Business, Other Amenities
Featured amenities include a business center, express check-in, and complimentary newspapers in the lobby. Event facilities at this hotel consist of conference space and meeting rooms. Free self parking is available onsite.

The 1-star Austrian Yard - Hostel offers comfort and convenience whether you're on business or holiday in Saint Petersburg. The hotel offers a high standard of service and amenities to suit the individual needs of all travelers. Free Wi-Fi in all rooms, 24-hour front desk, Wi-Fi in public areas, car park, airport transfer are there for guest's enjoyment. Each guestroom is elegantly furnished and equipped with handy amenities. Entertain the hotel's recreational facilities, including garden. Convenience and comfort makes Austrian Yard - Hostel the perfect choice for your stay in Saint Petersburg.

address: King Fahd Branch Rd Al Olaya, Riyadh Province, Saudi Arabia Riyadh City 12213 Saudi Arabia

descriptions.hotel_information: Situated in Riyadh, 1.3 km from Kingdom Center, Copthorne Hotel Riyadh features an outdoor pool and terrace. Guests can enjoy the on-site restaurant. Free WiFi is offered throughout the property and free private parking is available on site.

name: Riyadh Copthorne Hotel

descriptions.hotel_information: Located in Gorukle Sakarya, Guler Park Hotel is a perfect starting point from which to explore Bursa. The property features a wide range of facilities to make your stay a pleasant experience. 24-hour security, free Wi-Fi in all rooms, 24-hour front desk, 24-hour room service, Wi-Fi in public areas are on the list of things guests can enjoy. Guestrooms are fitted with all the amenities you need for a good night's sleep. In some of the rooms, guests can find television LCD/plasma screen, closet, internet access – wireless, air conditioning, heating. Recuperate from a full day of sightseeing in the comfort of your room or take advantage of the hotel's recreational facilities, including fitness center, sauna, massage. No matter what your reasons are for visiting Bursa, Guler Park Hotel will make you feel instantly at home.

address: Emin Sinan, Piyer Loti Cad. No:30, 34050 Fatih/İstanbul, Turkey

descriptions.hotel_information: <p><b>Property Location</b> <br />With a stay at Ajwa Hotel Sultanahmet, you'll be centrally located in Istanbul, minutes from Cemberlitas Bath and Hippodrome.  This 5-star hotel is close to Grand Bazaar and Blue Mosque.</p><p><b>Rooms</b> <br />Make yourself at home in one of the 61 air-conditio...

name: Ajwa Hotel Sultanahmet

address: Near Cremino, Airport Road, 1001 Beirut, Lebanon

descriptions.hotel_information:
Featuring an Arabesque décor, Assaha Convention Hotel is located 5 minutes’ drive from Rafic Hariri Airport. This 4-star hotel offers free Wi-Fi along.
The stylish, air-conditioned rooms at Assaha Convention Hotel come with a balcony, a minibar and a flat-screen satellite TV. The private bathroom is fitted with a bath, shower and free toiletries.

At Assaha Convention Hotel there is a 24-hour front desk and meeting facilities. Ironing, laundry and dry cleaning can be provided for a fee. The hotel is 6 km from the vibrant Hamra Street and 4 km km from Beirut National Museum. 

This property is also rated for the best value in Beirut! Guests are getting more for their money when compared to other properties in this city.

name: Assaha Convention Hotel

address: Kuloglu Mah. Güllabici Sokak No. 17 Cihangir

descriptions.hotel_information:
Property Location
With a stay at Ditto Flats in Beyoglu (Istanbul City Center), you'll be minutes from Museum of Innocence and Mixer. This apartment is close to Topkapi Palace and Suleymaniye Mosque.

Rooms
Make yourself at home in one of the 5 air-conditioned rooms featuring kitchenettes with full-sized refrigerators/freezers and stovetops. LCD televisions with satellite programming provide entertainment, while complimentary wireless Internet access keeps you connected. Conveniences include safes and desks.

Business, Other Amenities
Featured amenities include luggage storage and laundry facilities.

name: Ditto Flats

address: Prospect Pobediteley 59А, Tsentralny District, 220035 Minsk, Belarus

descriptions.hotel_information:
One of our top picks in Minsk.
Offering a restaurant, free sauna and indoor pool, Victoria-2 Hotel is located in Minsk, a 5-minute walk from Victory Park. Free Wi-Fi and free private parking are available on site.

Rooms here will provide you with a flat-screen TV, air conditioning and a minibar. The private bathrooms also come with a bath and a hairdryer.

At Victoria-2 Hotel you will find a bar and a mini-market on site. Guests are welcome to visit the on-site restaurant Victoria Platinum and taste Belorussian and European cuisine.

Guests can relax at the on-site SPA centre with spa facilities. It offers massages, cosmetology procedures and a hairdresser's.

lake Komsomolskoe is located a 10-minute walk from Victoria-2 Hotel. Nemiga Metro Station is located 1.5 km from the property. The distance to Minsk International Airport is 40 km from the hotel, and Minsk Train Station is 7 km away. 

Tsentralny District is a great choice for travelers interested in clean air, food and local food.

name: Victoria & SPA Hotel Minsk

address: Uzungöl mahallesi gölbaşı mevki no:18 Çaykara/Trabon Çaykara, Trabzon 61940 Çaykara, Trabzon Türkiye

descriptions.hotel_information: Featuring free WiFi throughout and a restaurant, Uzungol Keles Hotel offers accommodation in a peaceful area in Uzungol, about 100 metres from Uzungol Plateau & Lake. The property also has a green garden, and free private parking is available on site. Simply decorated, all rooms are fitted with a flat-screen TV. Some rooms include a seating area to relax in after a busy day. Certain rooms feature views of the mountains or lake. Each room is equipped with a private bathroom with slippers and free toiletries. There is a 24-hour front desk, a shared lounge, dry cleaning services and gift shop at the property. Daily breakfast is served at the on-site restaurant. The nearest airport is Trabzon Airport, 92 km from the property.

name: Keles Hotel Uzungol

descriptions.hotel_information:
Property Location
Hilton Garden Inn Eskisehir is centrally located in Eskisehir, walking distance from Kilic Lunapark and close to Esbay. This hotel is within close proximity of Espark Shopping Center and Es Es Karting.

Rooms
Make yourself at home in one of the 126 air-conditioned guestrooms. Conveniences include safes and coffee/tea makers.

Dining
Satisfy your appetite at a coffee shop/café serving guests of Hilton Garden Inn Eskisehir.

Business, Other Amenities
Featured amenities include a business center and a safe deposit box at the front desk.

Hotel Naxos Palace is a brand new 4 star hotel in Naxos, functioning since 2005, built in an environmental friendly way. The hotel was constructed in a manner that none of the pre-existing cedar trees needed to be cut down.Our hotel Naxos Palace is developed hillside in an amphitheatric way, allowing most of the rooms to have a panoramic sea view.One of the best hotels in Naxos, hotel Naxos Palace is a guarantee for a wonderful accommodation!

Property Location
With a stay at Villa Huinid Hotel Bustillo in Bariloche, you'll be convenient to Fenoglio Museum of Chocolate and Piedras Blancas Lookout. This 4-star hotel is within close proximity of Bariloche Casino and Cerro Viejo Eco Park.

Rooms
Treat yourself to a stay in one of the 70 individually decorated guestrooms, featuring fireplaces and LCD televisions. Complimentary wireless Internet access keeps you connected, and cable programming is available for your entertainment. Conveniences include phones, as well as laptop-compatible safes and minibars.

Amenities
Don't miss out on the many recreational opportunities, including a health club, an indoor pool, and a sauna. This hotel also features complimentary wireless Internet access, concierge services, and an arcade/game room.

Dining
Grab a bite to eat at the hotel's restaurant, where you can take in a garden view, or stay in and take advantage of room service (during limited hours). Quench your thirst with your favorite drink at a bar/lounge. A complimentary buffet breakfast is served daily.

Business, Other Amenities
Featured amenities include a business center, express check-in, and express check-out. Event facilities at this hotel consist of a conference center and a meeting room. Free self parking is available onsite.

address: Aeroporto Internacional de Lisboa, Rua C  , Lisbon   1749-125 LISBOA   Portugal

hotel_information:
Located near the Lisbon International Airport, the Star Inn Lisbon Airport offers 173 comfortable and modern rooms. All rooms are equipped with LCD TV with satellite channels, air conditioning, free access to Internet / Wi-Fi, safe, telephone and private bathroom with hairdryer. Non-smoking rooms available.

This hotel includes a breakfast room where they are served daily. The hotel's Stars Caffé is open 24 hours a day, 7 days a week, and serves a variety of drinks and light meals. The Star Inn Lounge Bar offers the famous Portuguese wines and some local spirits. Also includes meeting and event room with capacity for 10 people.

Also note the room service, 24-hour front desk, laundry service, free access to Internet / Wi-Fi, business center, elevators, tourist information, car parking and garage (surcharge).

name: Star Inn Lisbon Airport

descriptions.hotel_information:
Property Location
Located in Sinop, Sinop Antik Hotel is convenient to Sinop Fortress Prison and Tarihi Cezaevi. This beach hotel is within close proximity of Diogenes the Cynic Statue and Kumkapı.

Rooms
Make yourself at home in one of the 41 air-conditioned rooms featuring minibars and LCD televisions. Complimentary wireless Internet access keeps you connected, and satellite programming is available for your entertainment. Private bathrooms with showers feature complimentary toiletries and hair dryers. Conveniences include phones, and housekeeping is provided daily.

Amenities
Head down to the water and enjoy a day at the private beach, or take advantage of other recreational amenities, which include an outdoor pool.

Dining
Enjoy a meal at a restaurant, or stay in and take advantage of the hotel's 24-hour room service. Quench your thirst with your favorite drink at a bar/lounge.

Business, Other Amenities
Featured amenities include a 24-hour front desk and coffee/tea in a common area. A roundtrip airport shuttle is provided for a surcharge (available 24 hours), and free self parking is available onsite.

A 5-minute drive from Ao Nang Beach, Centra by Centara Phu Pano Krabi offers comfortable rooms with a balcony and free WiFi access. This children-friendly resort has a swimming pool and a children's pool.

Looking out towards the pool or the limestone hills, the air-conditioned rooms feature light wood furnishings and soothing colours. Amenities include a flat-screen TV with international channels, a minibar and tea/coffee making facilities. The en suite bathroom comes with a shower and free toiletries.

During their stay at Centra by Centara Phu Pano Krabi, guests can stay fit in the gym or indulge in meals at the restaurant. Babysitting service is also available.

Within a short drive, restaurants, shops and bars can be found. Krabi Town is a 20-minute drive away, while Krabi International Airport is a 30-minute drive away. 

This property is also rated for the best value in Ao Nang Beach! Guests are getting more for their money when compared to other properties in this city.

name: Centra by Centara Phu Pano Krabi

descriptions.hotel_information: Located in New Town, Aparthotel Adagio Edinburgh Royal Mile is a perfect starting point from which to explore Edinburgh. The hotel has everything you need for a comfortable stay. Free Wi-Fi in all rooms, 24-hour security, 24-hour front desk, facilities for disabled guests, Wi-Fi in public areas are there for guest's enjoyment. Guestrooms are fitted with all the amenities you need for a good night's sleep. In some of the rooms, guests can find air conditioning, desk, telephone, television, satellite/cable TV. Access to the hotel's fitness center will further enhance your satisfying stay. For reliable service and professional staff, Aparthotel Adagio Edinburgh Royal Mile caters to your needs.
